comments.author: xtqqczze
comments.body: @iSazonov @RDIL I asked about using dependabot for StyleCopAnalyzers at dotnet/runtime#45779.

comments.author: iSazonov
comments.body:
> @iSazonov @RDIL I asked about using dependabot for StyleCopAnalyzers at [dotnet/runtime#45779](https://github.com/dotnet/runtime/pull/45779).

They are large team and they can track manually.

We don't configure dependabot to auto-merge so I am ok if dependabot will create new PRs but only if new versions are not released frequently (monthly?).

comments.author: xtqqczze
comments.body:
> > @iSazonov @RDIL I asked about using dependabot for StyleCopAnalyzers at [dotnet/runtime#45779](https://github.com/dotnet/runtime/pull/45779). > > They are large team and they can track manually. > > We don't configure dependabot to auto-merge so I am ok if dependabot will create new PRs but only if new versions are not released frequently (monthly?). I think releases may be more frequent until C# 9.0 support is complete. But generally releases happen less often, see https://github.com/DotNetAnalyzers/StyleCopAnalyzers/releases.
